alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 9:57AM MST until December 09 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 15 inches, except 2 to 25 inches over the mountains possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon MST today. For the Winter Storm Watch, from this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
